ui.title: Law Enforcement Support
ui.subtitle: Giya para kadagiti survivors nga kayatda ti agkonsulta iti law enforcement wenno ag-file ti criminal complaints.
ui.hotline_desc: Mandato ti Cybercrime Investigation and Coordinating Center (CICC) nga mangted ti immediate technical assistance ken mang-coordinate ti imbestigasyon iti cybercrime.
ui.vawc_desc: No kasapulam dagiti officers nga trained specifically para iti Violence Against Women and Children (VAW-C) cases, please contact the PNP specialized unit.
ui.wcpc_name: PNP Women and Children Protection Center (WCPC)
ui.expect_desc: Ti panag-file ti complaint ket maysa a formal process. Daytoy ti mapasamak no umasidegka:
ui.expect_step_1_desc: Denggen dagiti officers ti sitwasionmo ken i-assess-da dagiti potential violations.
ui.expect_step_3_desc: Makipag-coordinate ti DICT-CICC kadagiti relevant platforms ken law enforcement units tapno aksyonanda ti kasom.
ui.cyberbullying_desc: Kasano ti ag-file ti complaint iti Pilipinas
ui.footer_desc: Biktima ka kadi ti impersonation wenno data privacy violation?
